remark.ch: 本課程另安排上機時間於每週四18:30~21:30 。教室I1-405-1

goal.en: "Learn the principals of data analysis Learn the roles of data analysis in business problems and business strategies. Learn SAS hands-on practices"
goal.ch: "Learn the principals of data analysis Learn the roles of data analysis in business problems and business strategies. Learn SAS hands-on practices"

content.en:
"Predicting Model - Decision Tree, Logistic Regression
Clustering – K-Mean, Na?ve Bayes Classification
Association – Basket Analysis
Text miming -- TFIDF
Overfitting and its avoidance
Model Evaluation
Business Problems and Data Science Solutions
Data Science and Business Strategy"

Data Science and Business Strategy"

textbook.en: "Data Science for Business - What do you need to know about data-mining and data analytic thinking by Foster Provost & Tom Farcett"
textbook.ch: "Data Science for Business - What do you need to know about data-mining and data analytic thinking by Foster Provost & Tom Farcett"
